DOC.HEADLINE: SOCCER ; U.S. KEEPS PREPARING , GETS ESTONIA
DOC.TEXT: The U.S. national soccer team will play the national team of Estonia today . The only time the nations have played was in 1924 , with the U.S. team winning , 1-0 , at the Olympic Games in Paris . Today ' s match , at 5 p.m. at Cal State Fullerton , will carry far less significance . Estonia , which gained its independence from the former Soviet_Union in 1991 , is preparing_for the 1996 European championships . The U.S. team is preparing_for this summer ' s World Cup and is coming_off an embarrassing 2-0 loss to Chile last Saturday . JULIE CART
